methods.javadoc: Creates a dynamic Type Descriptor data type.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a dynamic Type Descriptor data type.

methods.javadoc:
Creates a dynamic Type Descriptor data type.
@param dtm the data type manager for this data type.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a dynamic Type Descriptor data type.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: the data type manager for this data type.

methods.name: getVFTableAddress
methods.comment: Gets the address of the vf table or null if one isn't indicated.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the program memory containing the address

return.comment: the address of the vf table or null.

methods.name: getSpareDataAddress
methods.comment:
Gets the address of the spare data, a 0 address if there is no spare data,
 or null.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the program memory containing the address

return.comment: the address of the spare data, a 0 value, or null.

methods.name: getVFTableName
methods.comment: Gets the type name for this descriptor.

params.name: buf
params.comment: the memory buffer where data has been created with this data type.

methods.name: getLength
methods.comment:
Gets the total length of the data created when this data type is placed at the indicated
 address in memory.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the program memory for this data.

params.name: address
params.comment: the start address of the data.

return.comment:
the length of the data. zero is returned if valid data can't be created at the
 indicated address using this data type.

methods.name: getLength
methods.comment:
Gets the total length of the data created when this data type is placed at the indicated
 address in memory.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the program memory for this data.

return.comment:
the length of the data. zero is returned if valid data can't be created at the
 indicated address using this data type.

name: RTTI0DataType
